text.div:
Medication Ingredient

https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/ValueSet/medication-ingredient-1

The Medication Ingredient value set includes values that may be used to identify a substance or a medicinal product that is an ingredient of a medication .

name: MedicationIngredient
title: Medication Ingredient
description: The Medication Ingredient value set includes values that may be used to identify a substance or a medicinal product that is an ingredient of a medication.
